overview: An eight-year-old Mamta is struggling with her homework. She gains the attention of her always strict class teacher as she reads from the unwritten essay on Mother; leaving the class teacher distressed.  Mum has won 19 international awards and is selected/nominated in 70+ film festivals across the globe. Mum also qualifies for the Oscars 2019
tagline: Based on world wide issue of female infanticide and child anandonment
title: Mum
